almanac.description: Ber-t(hr)o(w) launches baseballs at incoming opps. He is our first line of defense.
almanac.story: Nothing throws this man off his game. He’s been dedicated since day one, perfecting his baseball pitch. How does he do it? “It’s 90% mental, 5% physical”, he says. “I’m always thinking about balls.”

almanac.description: Bishop can throw two baseballs at a time
almanac.story: Don’t let his small frame deceive you, he’s got a lot of strength and an even bigger package. He stays modest about it, though he finds it effortless to reach home base. His advice? “It’s not the size of the bat, or even the hardness of the wood. It’s the kindness that matters.”

almanac.description: Luis blows smoke that can pass through tables and opps
almanac.story: Luis exudes a laid-back vibe that's hard to miss. “It's all about the haze, man,” he says, exhaling a cloud of smoke that envelops approaching opps. The effectiveness of his method can't be denied - where there's smoke, there's Green Luis Haze.

almanac.description: Throws four beer bottles at a time
almanac.story: Colin is a man of 4-titude. Balancing a 4.0 GPA and a love 4 beer, he serves as our Director of Academic Affairs and our 4-front defense against opps. “I've got 4 words for you: work hard, play hard,” he advises, launching a four-pack salute of 4% ABV. “I'm all for balanced living”

almanac.description: Pl-ice-sted throws smirnoff ice bottles after chugging them that deal heavy damage
almanac.story: Smirnoff Pl-ice-sted is the life of the party. With his legendary 6-second Smirnoff Ice chugging skills, he's won the title of “Throat Goat” hands down. But don't think he's all drink and no drive - those bottles he chugs end up whizzing towards the opps. “It's my version of recycling”

almanac.description: Skinner launches frozen ice that pierces and slows the opps
almanac.story: It all started when he put on that diamond. He’s always been known for his cool fashion sense, but now he's honestly gone too far. His outfit is freezing.You can’t even see that shit, it's under all that ice. The ice is blinding. Either way, he keeps his mind sharp and the opps at bay.

almanac.description: Tap on Captain Davis to request a deadly hellfire missile strike
almanac.special: Deals extreme damage with direct hit, a bit less with splash damage
almanac.story: People think he’s trying to go into the military because of patriotism, or a particular disdain for minorities. But that’s not true. He wants BIG BUFF MEN to order him around and DOMINATE him. It’s not bad being a bootlicker when you freaking LOVE FEET

almanac.description: Mario will take the pain and suffering so that you don’t have to.
almanac.story: The opps have learned the hard way that Mario the Stoic is an immovable force. Despite the chaos that often surrounds him, he remains relaxed and unfazed. He's been known to mutter some unintelligible lines as he blocks the path of the advancing opps. A language barrier, perhaps.

almanac.description: House Managers produce Xs off, which allows you to recruit brothers. You need as many house managers as you can get!
almanac.story: Oh, there’s a drop of piss on the dining room floor? You didn’t do your chore, did you? GET FUCKED, here is a 1 MILLION Xs. Good luck paying that off, but in the meantime, how about you fight off some opps for me? I’ll pay in increments of 25

almanac.description: Blocks and deals damage to opps with his smoke cloud
almanac.story: Faded Pranav Purple knows how to cloud out the issues. His smoke is his shield, and he's more than happy to share it with the opps. “I'm not as tough as a Mario, but I'm way more fun at parties,” he remarks, puffing out another hot-box cloud. “What’s that smell?” The opps say.

almanac.description: Single-use: Hits the griddy forward on the opps
almanac.special: Damages all opps caught in the griddy
almanac.story: “Bitches love the way I move”. He says, as he hits a devious griddy and leaves the premises. AndRizzle is someone who just can't stay still, he's always looking for his next adventure. He's got a lot of exotic locations ahead of him, and he won't let the opps stand in his way.

almanac.description: Single-use: Smashes the opps in a single tile
almanac.story: Jacob Slammer is all about equations and wrestling. He's as likely to discuss differential calculus as he is to perform a body slam. When the opps encroach on his territory, he's ready to defend. “The integral part of a good defense is a good offense,” he says, cracking his knuckles.
